*div1 type="summary"* *p*W. B. Travis to James F. Perry, August 11, 1834. Certain probate business. Slavery.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe De Austin*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-11-1834"> August 11th 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr Jas. F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir I send you a commission from the *person_mentioned*court */person_mentioned*here to take an Inventory of the property belonging to the *person_mentioned*Estate of John Randon*/person_mentioned* deceased, which is in your *location_mentioned*neighborhood*/location_mentioned*, and to deliver the same over to *person_mentioned*Mrs. Susan Randon guardian of the minor heirs of John Randon*/person_mentioned* etc. I presume however the *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*has been hired for the year. If so *person_mentioned*Mrs. Randon*/person_mentioned* had better let the *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*remain where they are, taking the obligation of the *person_mentioned*hirer's*/person_mentioned* to deliver them and pay the hire to her on the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1835">1st of January next*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*No news from *person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned*. *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*will send a memorial in his favor. *person_mentioned*Almonte */person_mentioned*has also written to the same effect.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. Barret Travis */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr James F. Perry */person_mentioned* Near *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr. Jack*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
